title: 1.9如何使用summon刷出自定义血量生物？
author: maps_of_China
txt_content:
1.9如何使用summon刷出自定义血量生物？？？？
本人做地图急需
貌似/summon Pig ~ ~1 ~ {Attributes:[0：{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:100000}]}的{Attributes:[0:{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:100000}]}失效了
求大神帮解答
把1.9自定义生物血量的NBT发到评论

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
/summon Pig ~ ~1 ~ {Health:100000.0f,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:100000.0}]}复制代码
那么多血...这是猪王么
